guide.title: register
guide.detail: go to ETSI SISTEMAS INFORMATICOS and find teacher Mavi, she will ask you Fill in several forms.
guide.detail_ch: 前往ETSI SISTEMAS INFORMATICOS找到老师Mavi，她会让你填写几张表格

guide.title: VISA
guide.detail: go to Santander in campus and tell the staff that you want to get a bank card.
guide.detail_ch: 前往学校的Santander银行，告诉职员你需要办一张存储卡。

guide.title: student card
guide.detail: go to ETSI SISTEMAS INFORMATICOS and find teacher Mavi and tell she that you want a student card.She will give you the card maybe a week later.avi, she will ask you Fill in several forms.
guide.detail_ch: 前往ETSI SISTEMAS INFORMATICOS找到老师Mavi，告诉她你想得到一张学生卡。

guide.title: school gym card
guide.detail: go to gym and find the staff and tell him or she that you want a gym card.
guide.detail_ch: 前往体育馆，告诉一楼的工作人员你想得到一张健身卡。

guide.title: outside gym card
guide.detail: go to gym and find the staff and tell him or she that you want a gym card.
guide.detail_ch: 前往体育馆，告诉一楼的工作人员你想得到一张健身卡。

guide.title: school library
guide.detail: go to gym and find the staff and tell him or she that you want a gym card.
guide.detail_ch: 给一楼大厅的工作人员看你的学生卡，他就会让你进图书馆
